newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Sri Lanka tender to buy only 20,000 T Sept gasoil.
newsitem.headline: Sri Lanka tender to buy only 20,000 T Sept gasoil.

text.p: Sri Lanka's state-owned Ceylon Petroleum Corp (CPC) has tendered to buy 145,000 barrels of 1.0-percent sulphur gas oil for delivery September 19-20, a CPC source said on Wednesday.
The tender seeks the gas oil for delivery to Colombo. It closes August 29 and offers should be valid for two days.
CPC has a tender to buy 160,000 barrels of 1.0-percent sulphur gas oil and 40,000 barrels of jet A-1 closing later on Wednesday for deliveries into Colombo September 9-10.
The tender closing later on Wednesday had originally specified 145,000 barrels of gas oil and 55,000 barrels of jet.
